name: Sand Worm
description: The Sand Worm is a gargantuan creature known for its formidable size, formidable attacks, and the ability to burrow through earth and rock, creating wide tunnels.
memorable: This creature can incapacitate foes by swallowing them and deals significant damage with its attacks.
goals: Hunt and ambush prey in its sandy environment.
relations: May dwell alongside other monstrous creatures in desert or subterranean environments.
environment: Typically found in deserts or rocky underground terrains.
strengths: Impressive physical strength with a high attack modifier and the ability to incapacitate opponents.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and intelligence limit its agility and cognitive abilities.
attacks: Can make a multiattack with its bite and tail stinger, dealing substantial piercing damage with each.
most_powerful_ability: Sand Cascade, which can disrupt enemy formations by knocking them prone.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet and tremorsense at 60 feet, allowing it to detect vibrations and movements effectively.
skills: Has proficiency in Stealth, making it somewhat effective in ambush situations.
additional_information: Can create a tunnel with a diameter of 10 feet.
Swallowing a creature blinds and restrains it.
Can retaliate against opportunity attacks with its bite or tail stinger.
